评论概述: Longer than pictured, but that is a good thing.
评论详情: This is a very nice dress for the money. As many reviewers have said, it is longer than pictured, but that is a good thing because "midi" length looks bad on everyone and should not be a thing anyone wears, unless they want to look short and fat. My issue was with the color. I picked the true red, but upon arrival it is clearly magenta. Not red. That means this one had to go back as I really needed red for my event.
I love the color and fit looked great , stretchy velvet. I was looking for something more spring for a wedding and the velvet just didn’t do it for me.
I loved this dress for a cocktail event and received a ton of compliments. I was able to wear it comfortably through the evening and night and was very flattering on my body.

This dress is perfect. The fabric is stretchy but the dress isn’t tight so it drapes on your body and flatters the curves in all the right places. The size chart is exactly right. The color is gorgeous!
The quality and make of this dress were excellent.  The fit is true to size. Great outfit for the fall/winter seasons.  I will purchase the royal blue dress to add to my wardrobe.  Highly recommend.
There is nothing to dislike about this dress.  The compliments was so much
Wanted an easy comfortable dress to wear for the holidays but this ended up being very cheap material and the color was not good. Fit was too tight and overall not flattering.
it wasn't super fancy but was super comfortable and nice enough. it's something I could wear to work with boots and a jacket.
The fit is gorgeous, and it's the perfect length, it drapes in all the right places and I got so many compliments on it!

Purchased this dress last minute. It did not disappoint. Very flattering. Fabric is lightweight with a little stretch. Fits true to size. I ordered the black and the bright red. The bright red with the velvety fabric reminded me too much of Santa - so just keep that in mind!
Loved the fit- perfect length and great style
This dress was great quality, the color was vivid and was a flattering dress for a 5'4 165 lb woman, I ordered a size 14, I would purchase again in another color
This looks great in person. Its sits nicely and is very comfortable and flattering.

评论概述: A perfect “I can eat in this” evening dress
评论详情: I bought this dress for my holiday graduation party and it looked amazing! It’s quite stretchy and soft, and the ruching allows you to cover up those areas in your stomach that might be a bit more showy (if that makes you uncomfortable). The cowl neck doesn’t show anything which makes this dress great if you want something a bit more covered. I ate a LOT in this dress and it still looked amazing on me after the end of the night, and it didn’t feel tight, which is incredible. I will admit that I don’t know how long this dress will hold up, so if it falls apart I will adjust the review accordingly, but so far, 5 stars! I did wear a coat over the dress after another lovely lady on here said that the dress can get messed up when driving in the car. I’d advise you do the same just in case. But yeah, great dress!

Arrived in one day and wearable right out of the bag! This dress did not disappoint. The fabric is lovely in all ways. It’s soft and nice weight with stretch and the color is beautiful. It has a zipper down the back and it drapes beautifully. I’m 5’1” and 125 lbs and the medium is a perfect fit. On me it’s like a floor length gown but I don’t need to have it hemmed. I’m wearing it to a winter barn wedding and my boots look great with it. Im really glad I ordered it. It had to travel in my suitcase and this fabric was fabulous for that. Came out of the suitcase ready to wear. The fabric is soft and comfortable and not too hot. I received so many compliments on this dress, its color and the fabric itself. I would definitely recommend this dress!!!
I love this dress, very flattering and high quality.  Wish I had more places to wear it.
Fit is perfect. Comfortably yet very pretty.  Little longer than anticipated, but looks great with a simple heel.  Can't wait to wear it to local event.

This dress is super comfy, dressy and extremely well made. I wore it for my husbands office Christmas party. I could sit and dance without any binding. It felt like a dream dress. I’m going to order more as it could be worn more casually as well.
This dress looks fantastic on. Great value for the price. The material does attract stray link, etc. May need to use a lint brush to keep bottom of dress looking good.

This was such a weird dress. I loved how it fit from the waist up but it was so short! My fault for not looking at some of the photos but I think I just assumed they were taller. I’m 5’5 and it hit me between my ankles and shins. It just made me look like my dress shrunk.
This dress is very cute. However I feel like it hugs all the wrongs places. Doesn’t hide the midsection well. The material is good though!

I'm around 5'7" 145 lbs and ordered size 10 in the wine color for my work Christmas party.  The weight of the material was excellent and the fit was flattering.  The cowl neck draped nicely with minimal fussing, and the length hit me just above the ankles.  Design-wise I would have liked side slits on both sides, but that certainly wasn't a deal breaker, just a personal preference.  Luckily the material had a good amount of stretch because I couldn't get the zipper to work (hence only 4 stars) so I had to slip it on over my head. Overall, I would not hesitate to purchase this very pretty dress again!
Nice fabric and flattering fit .
The dress fit well. I am 5'4" so it was ankle length on me, but fit great otherwise. Very comfortable and forgiving material/color.
True to size decent quality for the money

This dress is EXACTLY what I was looking for to wear to my work holiday party. The party invitation said cocktail/formal and masquerade party. I have been to these parties for many, many years and always see a spectrum of attire. I wanted something different and holiday-ish and not too over the top - and this dress was perfect! I've recently been a size 10 but have lost weight this year and am down to a 6. Because I was uncertain, I actual bought this dress in too different sizes - purchased the bright red in Medium and the wine red/burgundy in Small. The Medium fight perfectly - couldn't have asked for better! And FYI, the tag in the Medium actually says 8 - go figure.  The velvet fabric was soft on the outside and smooth on the inside, which actually flowed nicely against my pantyhose (did NOT cling to the pantyhose or get stuck, like sometimes happens). And the dress wasn't an overly heavy weight, either - it was perfect. The cowl neck laid very nice as well - not too much, and didn't droop low like they sometimes did. I'd wear this again and would certainly buy in different colors if I had the need!
This dress fit perfectly. Such a great deal! Material feels great and has a bit of stretch. Looks flattering and received many compliments.
I bought this to wear for my brothers wedding and it fit perfectly and looked stunning!  I was so happy with it.

Bought this for a wedding and I’m so happy with it! It’s comfortable and lightweight. Definitely a fall and winter dress. Flattering for every body type. I have a large chest (36GG) and it’s very hard to find dresses that fit. I bought it in red and ice blue. Worth every penny

I bought a 6 & had to return for a size 8. It seems well-made and the velvet is so soft. Very flattering dress. I’m 5’2 and the dress hit right above my ankles, so for me it was a perfect length for a cocktail- attire wedding I’ll be attending. I’d say size up one, at least. I’m 118lbs and a size 6 normally fits me, so was a little surprised I had to size up.

I read all the reviews and looked over tons of dresses on the site. Finally took a chance after seeing photos and comments. I got the blue and it is gorgeous. I am 5"4 and 115lbs, broad shouldered with a bit of a belly..fits me perfectly. Washed it and it came out perfect. I have never bought a fancy dress on here and it looks expensive store bought. Don't hesitate.

This dress got me so many compliments, it's indeed a dress to impress. What I liked most about this one is it's comfortable at the sane time very stylish. You can be a hostess, do all the running around and still look fashionable. It's velvet fabric in the pictures come out extra glamorous and it's stretchy so it fits on your body quite well. Highly recommend for your holiday parties!
Pretty, and it’s comfortable. Would buy again. Thumbs up.👍
Dress is brown is beautiful.  Stretches and fits perfectly true to size. Very comfortable and easy to wear. Great value for quality.

评论概述: Great dress, room to move and yet sexy fit
评论详情: As other reviews have said, this dress is a great fit. Room to move, but hugs the right areas with stretchiness yo accommodate dinner.  Wore this to an event and have never received so many compliments.

评论概述: Loved it so much I bought it another color
评论详情: This dress is perfect for a fuller figured woman. It hugged my curves perfectly and is the perfect length if you are on the shorter side- I'm 5'4" for reference. All you need is a good body shaper underneath, some cutesy & demure shoes, and the dress will take care of the rest.
Comfortable, perfect fit! Exactly what I was looking for!

This dress is perfect for a formal event. I love the beautiful rich royal blue color and the velvet fabric. It has ruching around the mid section to help detract attention from  imperfections. The mermaid fit is lovely and flattering. I am considering wearing it to a ballet performance in December.

These dress is true to size and really cute. Be sure to check the size chart and order according to it. The fabric feels really soft, and the dress is very comfortable. I'm 5'8" and it comes all the way down to my ankles. But, it doesn't drag the ground, so I can wear flats with it.

This dress was a wonderful surprise! It exceeded my expectations in every way.  Because of the stretchiness of the fabric, it fit like a glove and was incredibly comfortable, and it was unwrinkled and ready-to-wear right out of the package.  It was long enough that I wore it for a formal event, but on someone else, it might be more  midi-length.  Got lots of compliments and will definitely wear again.  Fit true to size. Highly recommend!

I'm 5 ft 8 in and weigh about 152 lb. I normally wear a size six or eight in most of my clothes. I normally wear a medium in Amazon stuff. Amazon recommended a size 8 for me and that's what I got. It fits perfectly! The ruching around the midsection is very forgiving! It's sexy without being sleazy. I got it in the dark purple and the color is absolutely gorgeous! Wearing this to a party in January but I can see this being a year-round special occasion dress thanks to the sleeveless styling. Very happy with purchase!
Gorgeous dress with the perfect fit.!!!

评论概述: Nice but what are those lines
评论详情: Just received my dressed and its a perfect fit but I noticed some horizontal lines on the back of the dress as if it were snagged or something. Is that normal? I don't normally wear dresses let alone order so I'm not sure what to think
Muy bonito cómodo me gustó mucho como quedó

I got this for an upcoming semi-formal wedding, and I love it!  This is a bodycon dress, so if you are not comfortable with your curves, you will not like this dress. It fits as described - a mermaid bodycon dress.  I am 5'5", 134 lbs, 32C, 28" waist, 38" hips, and ordered a size 6.  I have not tried this on with any shape wear, and it hugs but is not tight.  The dress is well-made, and a great deal for the price.  I am excited to wear it for the wedding next weekend!

The fabric feels nice. It doesn’t pull on the wrong places and is forgiving for a body on dress. It has a zipper which isn’t necessary because it’s stretchy but it’s nice. It was on sale when purchased so it is good for the price. I bought wine red but feel maybe should get black
Beautiful dress. True to size. Just like the picture.

I am OBSESSED with this dress. Material is high quality, and has a bit of stretch. The color is perfect for fall. Extremely flattering and comfortable. Can’t say enough good things about this dress! Fit like a glove! I got a size 6.
This is really a beautiful dress. The blue color is stunning.
Beautiful dress but it just did not fit me!  It was tight around the middle.
This is a gorgeous dress. Beautiful color and style. It's sexy too! You won't be disappointed.
I opened the package, and didn't even try this dress on. I saw loose threads, and fabric quality looked extremely poor.
Loved the dress and it fit good
This dress is absolutely beautiful and the fit was perfect
Beautiful dress. Very flattering but much longer than expected.
Love the dress for my daughter!
This dress fit my daughter perfect. It is adorable and well made!!
Great fit! Very forgiving for a bodycon dress. Got so many compliments.
It was a great dress, fit well and felt great. But with the seatbelt on the front of it, the fabric started pull apart. I have blue lint everywhere

评论概述: What you see is what you get.
评论详情: Very nice simple black dress.  True to size.  Lovely.

This dress fit perfectly right out the bag. Lightweight and flattering. Draped on the body like Roman marble statue fabric, sexy and comfy. I don’t even have to suck my stomach in/ ya know, be uncomfortable like other tight/ bodycon clothing. Got here overnight too lol wut. And then, as you can see, it stretches and is not limiting in any way. And it’s long enough so you don’t have to constantly being scared to bend over/squat/climb, I feel like I could even run in this. Size 8 ordered, 138lb, 34F, 5’6” Ordered for my birthday this weekend, and I’m pumped.
Its really cute.
I love the dress. It was used for wedding as a guest of the bride. I got so many compliments. Dress fit great.

This is really pretty but the length was weird on me. It’s definitely body con. I am 5’7” and it hit me just above my ankles. I feel like it needed to be either shorter or floor length. At the length it is, it ended up looking like it was an awkward length because it was snug around my hips. I’m 150 lbs and a size 10, for reference.
Nice fit

评论概述: The most flattering fit and flare
评论详情: This dress is amazing. You can wear the top off the shoulders, one shoulder, pulled up- it’s like wearing a different dress every time.  Wearing this to a fall wedding because the color (I ordered the purple) looks so rich and expensive. The shape is so flattering. I sized down and the stretch makes it even more flattering personally.
The frontal part is a bit strange on me

My wife loves dresses.  We've had a good track record with Grace Karin products.  This isn't the style she usually goes for, but we had the opportunity to try one for review.  This one fit perfect.  It's very classy looking and she has stated a couple of time that she can't wait for a formal occasion to wear it.  It fits true to size and the velvet material is very stretchy in case you eat a bit too much at a dinner party.  It's pretty forgiving.  Great dress.

I wore this dress to my son’s wedding rehearsal dinner. It was absolutely beautiful on and fit so well. Great stretchy velvet material. I washed it in a laundry bag on gentle cycle for just a few minutes and then dryer for 5 minutes and all the wrinkles came out easily. Does not come in an extra small. I am 5’5” 115 lbs and was a great fit but a tiny bit of extra material at my lower back. Fell to my ankles so showed off my shoes. This will be a midi dress on taller people. Purple was true to color on website. Don’t hesitate to buy in many colors.  Also loved that it was easy to wear a bra. So many event dresses have fussy necklines.
Very beautiful dress. I had lots of compliments on it. Worth every penny. Absolutely love it.

评论概述: Looks like a high end dress!
评论详情: Really lovely cut and fabric, sewn extremely well. You would think this is a way more expensive dress. Got a 6 and it fits like it was made for me. I’m 5’8” and weigh 132 lbs. I have an average bust line but think this dress could handle a large chest, there’s stretchy give to the fabric but not so much that’s it’s overly tight or clingy.

评论概述: Beautiful dress at a remarkable price
评论详情: This Grace Karin black velvet feel dress is stunning.  It's high quality,  which,  in my opinion,  makes it a remarkable value at just under $50. It's comfortable,  lightweight and breathable, with a flattering fit. Definitely recommend!

This dress flatters  in all the right places . I’mWearing it to a fall wedding with gold sparkling heels  . It’s so comfortable and the neckline sits perfectly ! It’s not too heavy either . It’s perfect and the color is so lovely ! Highly recommend!

I am 5 foot seven, 135 pounds. Measurements 36-28-38. I bought this in a size medium, and it fits amazing. This dress is a nice fabric with a lot of stretch to it. I just took it out of the bag and tried it on and as you could see in the picture, there’s not one wrinkle, which is a priority to me because it’s going to be packed in a suitcase to go to a wedding. I love that I do not need any special undergarments to wear it To a formal affair, my regular bra will do. Price was unbelievable for such a great dress. I just might be getting more in different colors. I highly recommend this if you like to be comfortable and look elegant.
Beautiful dress and fit perfectly but arrived with a 3 inch hole in the side. Right between the hip and thigh.

This dress is comfortable, stylish, and fits me like a glove. The velvet material looks really awesome in the Royal Blue color I chose. It's form fitting without being too revealing, and I can't wait for an occasion to wear it to!
hugs the right places.

I think the fit on this was a bit “saggy” in my opinion. I didn’t hate the dress, but I definitely felt like some bits might have been too boxy while others too tight. The material is okay. Kinda thin, but not see through which is good.
I bought 3 different dresses on here for a wedding. This one won me over. It's a very beautiful dress. Very classy.
I ordered this dress for upcoming fall wedding.  It is very comfortable and elegant.  Fits well size 8 for 5’ft 2in weigh 133#.
Fit

I have several Grace Karin dresses, bathing suits, and even a belt, and they never disappoint. I ordered a size 8 and it fits good. I'm 5'9", 160 lbs, 38", 27", 37". I would be a 6 in waist & hips but bust would be size 10 so I went in the middle. It's still fitted throughout my waist & hips, and the bust is snug but not uncomfortable by any means. I think I could have worn a size 6 and it would have been fine in the chest since it is flexible. The material is soft and feels nice on your skin. The dress is elegant enough for formal events or a date night. The price is very reasonable for the high quality you get. Highly recommend!

评论概述: Nice dress but unforgiving without shapewear
评论详情: My wife selected this dress as we have to attend several semi-formal events per year and one cannot wear the same dress twice! She did not have a purple dress, so this one was selected to augment her dress arsenal.  She found the construction good, fabric comfortable, and sizing accurate but the clingy nature of the material highlights figure imperfections and construction of foundation garments, so make sure those are smooth and well fitted.  It's been worn to one event and proved easy to launder afterwards. Due to the the modest neckline slightly elastic nature of the fabric, it's a great "loaner" for friends or relatives of similar size who get "no notice" invitations to formal events.
The design of this dress is very forgiving and festive. I am a 10/12 ladies and the size works great for me.

评论概述: Gorgeous Cowl Neck Dress for a Formal Touch
评论详情: I just got and wore the GRACE KARIN Women’s Cowl Neck Long Formal Dress, and OMG, it’s stunning! The velvet fabric feels luxurious and the cowl neck adds a touch of elegance.  The ruched detailing and mermaid cut make it super flattering, hugging all the right places. It’s perfect for any formal event or cocktail party. I felt like a total queen in this dress—definitely worth every penny! Highly recommend!

This women's velvet formal long dress is simply stunning. Sleeveless and featuring a round neckline, this ruched mermaid style cocktail dress is a real gem. From the moment I saw it, I was in awe. The design is exquisite and elegant. Upon trying it on, it fit me perfectly, flattering my figure in a lovely way. The quality of the material is remarkable, it is not see-through and feels really good to the touch. The dress looks exceptionally well put together, radiating sophistication and style. All in all, I consider this dress to be an exceptional choice for formal or cocktail events, and I would wholeheartedly recommend it to any woman looking to stand out and feel beautiful on a special occasion.

I normally stay away from bodycon dresses, especially with the mermaid bottom. However, I’ve found that Grace Karin dresses have a decent fit for my body type. This dress is no exception. For reference, I am 5 feet and 5 inches tall and weigh 130 pounds and normally wear medium-sized clothes, and this dress in medium fits me right. The dress is made out of a medium thickness velvet fabric that is a bit stretchy and wrinkles but not too much. I also like the design of the dress. The cowl neckline provides a nice draping across the bust. There are also a few horizontal pleats on the right side that provide draping that helps hide an abdominal bulge if needed. The length of the dress is perfect for me, and the mermaid bottom adds some elegance to the dress. Overall, I am pleased with this dress. It is beautiful and elegant.

This Grace Karin dress comes in a variety of beautiful colors and the fabric is a very nice quality stretch velvet. The blue I ordered is a deep, gorgeous blue that I absolutely love.  This dress has clean lines and an elegant silhouette. The rouching helps to hide any figure flaws, adds interest and sets off your waistline. This skims your body and hugs your curves without being too tight. The only thing I am not totally in love with is the neckline. The cowl has a tendency to sag a bit and not look as elegant as the rest of the dress. Otherwise  this has a very attractive, high end look that would lend itself well to an evening on the town, or a special event such as a wedding. I am very happy with it.

Dress is beautifully made. I usually wear a size 10 sometimes an 8. This dress fits a little snug but I like it. Great quality, style and price. Walk in any room with elegance and grace with Grace Karin's stylish clothing.
Very beautiful and elegant dress. Good quality velvet, beautiful color. Fits well. Very happy with this purchase.
